articles.title: East Bridgewater man sentenced to life in prison for 2022 fatal stabbing
articles.description:
Tishaun Miller, 44, was sentenced to life in prison without parole for the murder of Douglas Rose in 2022, officials said.

The post East Bridgewater man sentenced to life in prison for 2022 fatal stabbing  appeared first on Boston.com.
